name: Remixed CD
description:
SHIPPING LAST WEEK OF OCTOBER 2013 
ALSO AVAILABLE FROM 
LAU's UK SHOWS IN NOVEMBER 
PLEASE NOTE THIS IS A PRE-ORDER CD

‘Remixed’ is the third release in the band’s own label EP series available on limited edition CD featuring eight exclusive new versions of Lau recordings.

An intriguing list of producers and musicians stepped forward to re-interpret, re-work and of re-think Lau’s original music for Remixed including (November 2013 tour special guests) Haiku Salut, acclaimed electronic artist Matthew Herbert, deep house / soundscape producer Claro Intelecto, Glaswegian techno producer Sei A and Frightened Rabbit’s Gordon Skene (Fraction Man) and Andy Monaghan (Andreas Lust). Remixed also features a new version of Imporsa by Silver Columns (aka Adem (Fridge) and Johnny Lynch of The Pictish Trail / Fence Collective) a track that featured in original form on the popular Lau vs Adem ‘Ghosts’ EP (2011).


Tracklisting 

Torsa (Haiku Salut)
The Bird That Winds The Spring (Fraction Man) 
Saint Monday (Claro Intelecto Vocal Mix) 
Throwing Pennies (Herbert)
Imporsa (Silver Columns) 
The Bird That Winds The Spring (Andreas Lust) 
Torsa (Sei A) 
Saint Monday (Claro Intelecto Instrumental Mix)

Available in late October 2013 this is a pre-order

name: Lau - Race The Loser CD Album
description:
Standard Digi Pack version of the new Lau CD with 
8 page booklet

Tracks: 

Saint Monday
Far From Portland
The Bird That Winds The Spring
Missing Pieces
Save The Bees
Torsa
Throwing Pennies
Noltland Castle
Beer Engineer


Released October 1st 2012



'Lau are a remarkable band - the most musically adventurous trio in British folk - exquisite and hypnotic, musicianship at its best '

THE GUARDIAN *****

'A classy, beguiling creation'
UNCUT 8/10 

‘an album for alternative music lovers as much as folk fans, brimming over with intoxicating, mesmerising music’
BBC 

'The world's first Post-folk group - Lau continually break new ground'

PROPERGANDA

'Race the Loser - a confident, assured record from a group stretching themselves and achieving great things'  

THE MORNING STAR****

'Leagues ahead of the crowd  - worthy of a David Lynch movie
expansive sonic landscapes  - it's time to ring some changes - may frighten a few horses'
fROOTS 

'an innovative, beautifully realised album'
OBSERVER ****

‘This is music of such stunning creativity – one of most thrilling live bands, now one of most thrilling studio bands as well – what phrase, what note can possibly be coming next? ’
SUNDAY HERALD

‘Lau are cutting edge renegades, super-charged with confident, free-thinking music that will enthrall’ 
FOLKRADIO.CO.UK

‘Echoes of Penguin Café Orchestra and later Beatles’ recordings’
BRIGHTYOUNGFOLK.COM

‘Buzzes full of natural light from which the band derives it’s name’ 
FT

name: Lau - Race The Loser + Live 2011 Deluxe 2CD/Book
description:
Limited Edition Deluxe double CD & Hardback Book
Album set (1,000 only worldwide)
contains the brand new studio album
Race The Loser plus an additional
full length live concert bonus disc
recorded on their 2011 UK Tour
(exclusive to this package).

In addition to the new music you
will receive a signed art print. 

Only available from Lau directly here.

TORSA

FAREWELL TO WHISKY CHESS LIVE

EVERGREEN LIVE
THE BURRIAN LIVE
HORIZONTIGO LIVE

HINBA LIVE

THIS LIVE ALBUM IS UNAVAILABLE
ANYWHERE ELSE AND WILL NEVER BE RELEASED ALONE.

name: Lau - Race The Loser & Ghosts Double Vinyl LP+ CD
description:
Race The Loser + Ghosts Double 180g Vinyl LP

The deluxe 180g double vinyl version includes ‘Ghosts’, Lau’s collaborative EP with Adem and a CD of ‘Race The Loser’.
Gatefold sleeve beautiful limited edition of 1,000

DIV042DLP 180g Double LP & CD 

VINYL DISC 1 
SIDE A 
Saint Monday 5:20 
Far From Portland 7:51 
The Bird That Winds The Spring 4:12 
Missing Pieces 0:38 
Save The Bees 5:27

SIDE B 
Torsa 6:59 
Throwing Pennies 4:27
 Noltland Castle 4:37 
Beer Engineer 5:17

VINYL DISC 2
LAU VS ADEM GHOSTS EP

SIDE C 
Farewell To Whisky Chess (9.33)
 Imporsa (7.47) 
Ghosts (4.32)

SIDE D 
Happy Sevens (1.06) 
Mr Timony (5.50) 
Jargonaut (3.32)
 Last Ghost Alive (2.43)

A bonus CD of Race The Loser (Disc only in a plastic wallet no booklet) is inserted to the gatefold package for your pleasure!

This is LAUdiophile heaven !

name: Lau - Lightweights & Gentlemen & Live Remastered 2CD
description:
Re-Released November 19th 2012 this is the classic debut studio album from 2007 and the much loved Live album from 2008 coupled in one 
spectacular hi-gloss digi pack. Included for the first time is a special 14 minute version of The Lang Set recorded in 2011 with Calum Malcolm and bonus live track Basil. All tracks remastered by Calum Malcolm. 

Disc1

Hinba – remastered
Butcher Boy – remastered
The Jigs – remastered
Results – remastered
Unquiet Grave – remastered
Souter Creek – remastered
Alyth’s & Kris’s – remastered
Freeborn Man – remastered
Moorhen’s – remastered
Gallohill – remastered
Twa Stewarts – remastered
The Lang Set 2001 Version – 14 minute + new recording (previously unreleased)

Disc2
Stewarts – live remastered
Banks of Marble – live remastered
Frank and Flo’s – live remastered
Butcher Boy – live remastered
Sea – live remastered
The Lang Set – live remastered
Unquiet Grave – live remastered
Hinba – live remastered
Gallowhill – live remastered
Basil – live remastered (previously unreleased)


RELEASED 19 NOVEMBER 2012
SHIPS FROM HERE NOVEMBER 12

BOTH ALBUMS REMASTERED
BY ORIGINAL PRODUCER
CALUM MALCOLM

name: Lau- Arc Light CD Album
description:
Lau's acclaimed second studio album (2009) repressed as a hi-gloss
digi pack with 8 page booklet by Reveal Records (2011). 
Includes the Mojo Magazine Beatles commission as bonus track ("Dear Prudence") and Kris Drever's much loved original song "Wintermoon".
 
Tracks:

The Burrian
Wintermoon
Horizontigo
Salty Boys
Banks of Marble
Stephen's 
The Master

Temple of Fiddes
Dear Prudence

REVEAL001CDX
CD Digi Pack with 8 Page Booklet

name: Lau & Adem - Ghosts (Lau vs Adem) CDEP
description:
Lau team up with electronic / acoustic artist, pioneer and producer Adem for the second in their 'Vs" collaboration series. Recorded at Adem's in 2011 it features 7 exclusive tracks including the song "Ghosts" by Kris Drever. 


Tracks

Farewell To Whisky Chess 9.33
Imporsa 7.47
Ghosts 4.32
Happy Sevens 1.06
Mr Timony 5.50
Jargonaut 3.32
Last Ghost Alive 2.43

Lau Scotland Ltd
Recorded 2011

CD Card Wallet Format
